    • readSOIL

      public boolean readSOIL​(java.lang.String modelInstancesDirectory, java.lang.String modelInstancesFilename, boolean verbose)
      Description copied from interface: JUSE_BasicFacade
      Processes a SOIL file
      Specified by:
      readSOIL in interface JUSE_BasicFacade
      Parameters:
      modelInstancesDirectory - Directory where the SOIL file resides
      modelInstancesFilename - The model instances filename (*.soil file)
      verbose - If true sends commands to console as well
      Returns:

    • dumpState

      public boolean dumpState​(java.lang.String author, java.lang.String javaWorkspace, java.lang.String cmdFile, boolean verbose)
      Description copied from interface: JUSE_BasicFacade
      Generates a CMD file containing objects, their setup and links among them
      Specified by:
      dumpState in interface JUSE_BasicFacade
      Parameters:
      author - The author of the specification
      javaWorkspace - Workspace directory where the generated commands file is to be created
      cmdFile - Name of the commands file
      verbose - If true sends commands to console as well
      Returns:
      true if the model was previously compiled (and therefore was able to dump the state), or false otherwise
